content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard, floating in my pool. a hot summer afternoon, clouds were of course forming. i saw something between two of these clouds, which seemed to be a cloud itself, but it had a more defined shape. it was, as best i can describe it, like the rear half of a stingray. (triangle with a long point.) i watched it for less than a minute, i guess. the clouds on either side continued building and morphing. the "object" vanished in a way i would describe as similar to "cloaking" ships seen on television.
content.summary: Floating in my pool. saw what looked like cloud. had defined shape. like stingray's rear half. vanished .

content.detailedDescription: 3-4 glowing orange objects hovered in the sky, i was only able to catch a short bit of one on my camera.
content.summary: Glowing orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I saw a light in the westernsky that i thought was a plane. i had seen a plane fly through the cloud cover two nights earlier and that was a great image as the landing lights lit up the clouds around the plane. i thought this wouldbe the same until the lights just stopped. it was an orang/red glow with some bright spots. no regular running or strobe lights. i watched it for about 30 seconds, then tried to get a picture,with no luck. i watched it for about another 30 seconds,just hovering in place,no noise. it's glow faded and i could make out pulsing red/yellow lights.Then it suddenly shot straight up, moving through the cloud cover,which glowed with it's passing.
content.summary: I thought it was a plane until it stopped and hovered.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog in the tysons corner area. i saw an aircraft traveling east along an unusual flight path compared to other flights in the area.  many flights approach national airport over the potomac river. this seemed to be cutting across north arlington.  it's not entirely unusual but it caught my attention because i pay attention to flight paths ever since 9/11.  

i'm reluctant to report this because the aircraft sounded like a conventional commercial jet although possibly not as loud.  this made my think it was a small jet.  so why am i reporting it?

the object appeared to be triangular and had a single tiny red blinking light in the middle section although not at exact center.  each corner of the aircraft had two lights stacked on top of each other.  there were other lights but les prominent.  

here is a stick figure of what the aircraft appeared like:
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]    put lights at each corner of an object like that...With a tiny red light blinking on the bottom...And that's what it looked like. 

the other thing about this was that the blinking lights were not as prominent as the permanent lights. so, it created a strange effect. 

i'm only reporting this in case anyone else saw it more clearly and wants to know there was a second person who saw it. 

to explain this report, it might be easy to find out landing times at national airport. this was spotted at exactly 637pm.  it was probably a conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Triangle object with red blinking light. sounded like conventional aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the house and my friend brian came over yelling for me to come look at this object he couldnt identify. i ra n outside and saw a glowing object near the horizon. then we noticed about 5 airplanes in the vicinity . the object slowly moved away seemingly to disappear. we both felt as if we trully experienceed something special. after it was gone we felt we had to report this.
content.summary: Bright glowing object slowly moved away seemingly to disappear

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out on my deck in my back yard. my 8 year old daughter was playing jump rope in the driveway and she said to me, "mommy the stars are moving." i got up to look and as i turned i saw a large object with four lights that looked like stars, turn counter clockwise toward the north slightly east and release an object that looked like a round white orb. i said to my daughter you are right you did see something move. i continued to watch the small object as it moved to the southeast. it moved slowly but faster than an airplane, which i then spotted moving from east to west. at this point my mother came outside and observed the smaller object moving toward the southeast as well. my daughter saw the most of the event. after the smaller object was ejected, i lost sight of the larger object just after it released the smaller object. it was sort of trianglar shaped but had 4 lights but the 4th light was the object released. i lost track of the smaller object as it disappeared past the trees and other buildings in the neighborhood.
content.summary: Larger craft that released a smaller object.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were driving from so cal to phoenix.It was early night and
we saw what appeared to be a mother ship and 3 baby ships in the sky.It would have been impossible not to see them.The mother ship was just drifting in the sky but the 3 baby ships were floating down with decreasing speed as they moved away from mama ship.Them they would drift back to mother ship and increasing speed shoot around larger ship and shoot off into the horizon and then drift back.This went on for an hour or more and was observed by me and my driver.The funny thing is they resembled biological beings and reminded us of looking at an aquarium with some very srange fish indeed.
content.summary: The night sky became an aquarium

content.detailedDescription: At about 5:30pm on the 25th nov 2011, i was looking out of my bedroom window over southampton valley , it was full dark outside and i noticed a bright orange light in the sky not moving but very intense over the bitterne area of southampton, i then went to get my brother to have a look at it , when we got back in i noticed another very bright red couloured light fly upwarards under the first at a very high speed and then slow under it  so now there was 2 bright lights in the sky , i noticed as it slowed it changed coulor and intensity to an orange red , by now we were quite amazed as these clerly were not normal aircraft so we rush to find our digital camera  and when we got back in the bedroom there were now 3 of the lights all oranage red bright hues in a large triangle formation the bottom 2 lights seemed to be moving to right and the top changed alitiude somewhat as we observed them after about 10 mins all 3 of the lights dissapeared the last to go being the bottom light we managed to take 2 photos but they didnt show anything due to probably the street and house lights below .The most remarkable thing was the speed at which the light came upwars under the first and the intensity of the light , they cannot have been chinese lanterns or firworks as these lights changed postion and alitude and at times were extreemly brilliant.
content.summary: , i noticed a bright light in sky outside window , went to tell brother came back and it was joined by a 2nd then a 3rd

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home from my parents house after thanksgiving dinner around 9:25. they live on top of a mountain overlooking the eastern part of candlewood lake. i came over a rise about 1/3 miles from the house and saw two red lights to the southeast about 20 to 25 degrees off the horizon. i drove about another 1/3 mile to a clearing where i had clear view to the east, south, and west. that's when i saw more clusters of red lights to the south and west. they appeared to come straight at my position from the southwest and arced to the southeast and disappeared, coming the closest about one mile from my position. there were over 15 lights in loose clusters of 3 to 4 lights per cluster moving independently from oneanother. the lights were not attached to any solid object, i could see stars between the lights. the lights were about 20 times larger than navigation lights on airplanes. i observed them for about four minutes, during that time the lights were consistent in size and shape. they didn't pulsate, flicker, change color, or make any sound.Their speed was roughly about 60 to 80 mph. after about three minutes of observing i called 911 and was connected to a brookfield ct dispatcher to see if anyone else was watching the lights. he said know one has. as i was talking to the dispatcher the last cluster of four lights were passing to the south of my position. at that time a private jet passed over my head at roughly 5000 feet, traveling from the south and going north. at that time the jets engines were the only mechanical sounds i was hearing. the night was crystal clear and the temperature was about 35 degrees. visibility was excellent almost to the horizon and there was no wind.
content.summary: Saw red lights to the south on candlewood lake

content.detailedDescription:
Our condo is on the atlantic ocean, we were in bed at 11.30 pm
when we heard a helicopter circling over and around in the ocean
very close by our condo, at first i thought the ocean was roaring,
i said to my husband "is that the ocean" he replied it was a helicopter
.After a few minutes, after it kept circling, i got up and pulled the drapes, all our lights were off. but i looked at the clock and it was
11.30, i then looked up and saw the green lights of a strange object,
i asked my husband to come and look ,    i said what is that, and 
he said he had never seen anything that looked like that. he is a retired
army pilot,and worked for boeing for many years as test pilot for them.

there were  clouds around  the object and occasionally they would out,
a dnwe could see better. however we cvould never see the whole thing.
from what we were able to see it looked to rectangler. 

we observed the object for 45 minutes, from 11.30 to 12.15 pm.

we tried to take pictures but all we got was orbs , large ones. 
we had no missing time.  we was not excited, or anything, just curious.
content.summary: Strange object with green and clear lights moving around.

content.detailedDescription: I was viewing orions nebulae at 2:15 am through my telescope. i thought the number of stars to be strange meaning there seemed to be more stars then there's supposed to be. then 3 "stars" or ufo's just started to move in a westerly direction. moving slowly for 10 minutes or so. all 3 just started to slow down then they all stopped at once. i sat there for a few more minutes to see if anything else would happen but nothing did so i went to bed.
content.summary: Watched 3 start then move some distance then stop

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting this because as a amature astronomer this is a very weird incident indeed.This can be read in the mansfield ,ohio news journal page 3-a titled baffling fireball reported.I am not a witness !
content.summary: A bright fireball that landed and lighted up the woods but just disapeared!

content.detailedDescription: While eating  thanksgiving dinner my husband looked out the living room window and notices an orange light moving across the sky,he  said what the hell is that?  it was an orange light moving across  the sky.  my son put his plate down and went outside  to look.  he was out there about  two minutes, when he came back inside he said to us i dont know what the hell that is!  so i went back outside with him to look. first thing i noticed it was a cloudless star lit night.  this orange light was moving slowly across the sky slowing down then moving again. also while we watched the light would turn a little red./ we watched for about three or four minutes then it almost stopped and then started going straight up we looked at each other in disbelief as it then vanished into the sky,when returning into the house wide eyed. i told my husband what  we had wittnessed and upon telling him i became sick to my stomach then sat down  continuing to stare out the window still in disbelief!
content.summary: Saw orange light that stopped,ascended and disappearedby 3 witnesses in gastonia nc.

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting date revised to 11/23/11.  all other info is correct.

we were watching a movie in the living room with the window blinds and back door still open. at approx. 10:45pm, while seated, my mother witnessed through the window a glowing orange fireball above the neighbor's roof. it appeared to be about the size of a full moon, but was too low and disappeared quickly. she ran outside to investigate and found it had moved far to the east, and was now about the size of a nickel held at arm's length. i did not see the initial fireball, but followed her outside directly because her reaction seemed so unusual. within seconds i observed the orange object to be aspirin sized at arm's length and moving quickly away from us in an easterly direction. within moments the object diminished in size until we could no longer see it. it appeared to be moving at a high rate of speed. we heard no sound. the entire event took 60-90 seconds. mom noticed it because it was bright, oddly out of place, and moving too quickly. it may be of note that we saw at least one helicopter in our field of view after the light disappeared, but the helicopter was easily identifiable and moving in a different direction. we are curious to know if anyone else saw this object.
content.summary: Maricopa sighting date revised to 11/23/11.

content.detailedDescription: Thanksgiving evening.  i received a phone call from a friend at 1825 et.  i get poor reception from verizon on my cell phone in the house so i went outside to my driveway to talk.  it was dark but the sky was clear.  looking to the northwest approximately 30 degrees or so above the horizon i noticed a bright orange glowing light.  it was probably the size of a couple of stars put together, or of an aircraft landing light in the distance.  i watched it for a few seconds because it was not the color of an aircraft landing light.  i also looked for strobe lights or aircraft navigation lights.  there were none.  i have seen the space shuttle take off from my house near ft. lauderdale and i'd characterize the light as similar but this was orange, not white.  the light moved across the sky and i ran to the door to the house to call my friend.  he came out and we both watched it as it moved to the south.  the light then seemed to hover in place on a magnetic heading of approximately 200 degrees.  the light then seemed to fade away as if it were moving off now directly away from us.  i asked my friend if he thought it could be an afterburner from a fighter.  he didn't think so because it was orange, not white.  i would have to agree because it seems that an afterburner would not be visible if the aircraft was moving horizontally across one's field of vision.  it would have to be flying away, especially as far away as the light seemed to be.  i went back in the house.  at 1842, just 17 minutes later, my friend called me back and i went back outside.  it was bizzare but there was another orange fireball like thing in the same place moving in the same direction.  this time i called for more of my guests and my wife, sister-in-law, and friend all came out.  they all saw it and we watched it do the same thing as the previous one.  each even probably lasted about a minute or so.   i should note that i am a 747 captain for a major u.S. airline.  i have been flying for 35 years and i have never witnessed anything like this.  the lights were not aircraft lights.  if anything this looked more like a very bright propulsion system or rocket exhaust but way off in the distance, thought it was very orange and circular.  there was no contrail or exhaust trail, just a glowing orange ball.   on both occasions we lost sight of the objects when they appeared to either change direction and fly directly away from us, or they just faded out, not sure which due to the distance.
content.summary: Orange like pulsing light moved across sky, hovered, then appeared to fade off into the distance.   seventeen minutes later another light flew almost the identical flight path and did the same thing.

content.detailedDescription: We were watching a movie in the living room with the window blinds and back door still open. at approx. 10:45pm, while seated, my mother witnessed through the window a glowing orange fireball above the neighbor's roof.  it appeared to be about the size of a full moon, but was too low and disappeared quickly.  she ran outside to investigate and found it had moved far to the east, and was now about the size of a nickel held at arm's length. i did not see the initial fireball, but followed her outside directly because her reaction seemed so unusual. within seconds i observed the orange object to be aspirin sized at arm's length and moving quickly away from us in an easterly direction. within moments the object diminished in size until we could no longer see it.  it appeared to be moving at a high rate of speed. we heard no sound. the entire event took 60-90 seconds. mom noticed it because it was bright, oddly out of place, and moving too quickly. it may be of note that we saw at least one helicopter in our field of view after the light disappeared, but the helicopter was easily identifiable and moving in a different direction. we are curious to know if anyone else saw this object.
content.summary: Glowing orange ball moving west to east near maricopa az

content.detailedDescription:
My friend called me at 9:40 p.M. last night from his house just north of highway 60 in tempe after seeing the first of these objects.  he and his buddy were in the back yard having cigars when they noticed the first light.  he described seeing a single glowing red light (like a red lantern) moving low across the sky in a very direct west to east path.  they had no idea what they were seeing.  the object was definitely not a commercial airliner since it 1) had no blinking navigation lights and 2) was not following the take-off pattern of the other planes that were in clear view.  

by the time he called me, he and his friend had watched a total of five "orbs" move across the sky in a period of about 25 minutes (some as singles, others in pairs).  as we were talking on the phone, he exclaimed that he was seeing another trek across the sky and told me in what direction to look.  i live about 3 miles to the north and west of him and could not see what he was describing.  i jumped in my car and drove to his house.  upon arriving at 10:05, he ushered me through the house to the back yard and we were standing there no longer than 5 seconds before he looked up and said, "there!"  sure enough, a group of three of these glowing red orbs was moving in the same west to east path that they had watched the last six cross.  i was stunned and immediately agreed that they looked like red lanterns.  their color and brightness were unwavering and they made absolutely no noise.  i could not believe how large they appeared as they had to be very close--it even seemed they could have been flying directly above highway 60 and at less than 1000 feet.  as they moved farther east, my friend said, "look!" and we saw a fourth coming from the west, following the others far behind.  then my friend said, "now watch, as they get far enough east, they flicker and then vanish."  i watched in astonishment as each of the three in the first group, one by one, flickered out and then the fourth did the same when it reached the equivalent position in the sky.  it did not appear that they flew behind clouds (as there were fewer last night than tonight) and that they had not disappeared beyond the horizon (they would have had to have traveled a much greater distance at that speed to go beyond the horizon).  my friend (who knows planes) said that they appeared to be moving "at about the speed of a cessna 150".  unfortunately, we could not get an accurate idea of the actual shape of the objects due to the glowing. 

my friend said the whole event made the hairs on the back of his neck stand up.  i cannot say the same since i was just shocked at viewing the four that i did.  if i had also stood there and watched the whole procession or had seen more come, i would have been equally creeped out.  i did manage to get video footage on my iphone but i have not downloaded it yet and i will have to edit the audio before posting it (thanks to the many expletives delivered by yours truly).  the thought did cross our minds while watching, "are we being invaded???"

after waiting for over an hour, we never saw another orb.  we find it hard to believe that no one else saw the objects because they were so obvious in the sky.  just before making this post, i read a very similar account of a sighting tonight from a witness nearby in chandler.  i cannot help but think that it could be the very same thing.
content.summary: 10 glowing red orbs move east to west

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along highway 97, a two lane highway, in eastern oregon near redmond late at night, around 11 or 12pm, when i saw a hovering light in the distance that looked at first like a plane.  as a drove closer i could tell that it either was not moving or was moving towards me at a snails pace.  the craft was off to the left hand side of the road 50 to 100 feet and up a few hundred feet off of the ground.  it was hovering above a small grouping of trees.  it was triangular shaped with a round-point nose, wings that cut off at the tip at about a 75 degree angle, with a boomerang style rear, as it cut in a bit into the body of the craft.  there was some sort of patterning on the wings, perhaps paneling or seams but they protruded enough to cast shadows by its lights, making the pattern look to sit off of the body of the craft an inch or two.  there were three blue ring lights arranged like the finger holes on a bowling ball, one at the tip and then two behind that one, they took up the majority of the body of the craft.  toward the end of the wings there was a white light on one side and a red light on the other.  it was approximately the size of the average three bedroom, 50's ranch style house, or smaller, with the wing span wider than it was long.  the craft hovered there as i drove by it and as i watched for it in the rear view mirror i saw it slowly move to the other side of the highway, so slow i could barely tell it had moved except for that it was on the opposite side of the highway.  i stopped watching after that so i don't know the rest of it's path.
content.summary: Triangle with three blue ring lights in the body with a red light on right wing and a white light on the left wing.

content.detailedDescription:
Was taking trash out after thanksgiving and noticed a single redish-orange fireball rising from eastern horizon from san diego city center. at first it looked like an asteroid but it was going up instead of down. shortly after a 2nd appeared from horizon following same path as the first. then there was a 3rd. i ran to get my wife so i wasn't the only one who saw. i also got my flipcam and captured whatever i could in the night sky.

the 3 objects followed the exact path rising fast at first then appeared to slow down as they rose. first object faded away then the 2nd and 3rd faded.

i've seen the shuttle launch from far away and i would liken the speed to it where low to the ground it appeared to be fast and then slow as it rose when in fact it was increasing speed but the trajectory made it appear it was slowing down.

the video i am attaching was when the objects reached their highest point and began disappearing.
content.summary: 3 redish-orange fireball-like objects in single-file formation rising up from horizon and fading till unviewable

content.detailedDescription:
Took a minute to have a smoke outside, during the thursday night game when i observed a unidentifiable craft pulsation random colors. it had 2 steady whites lights and what seem to be random colors going completely around in a clockwise pattern turning the white lights a selective color. i was able to catch it in video for 4 minutes, as it proceeded a flight pattern from east to west. lost site of it as it continued west somewhere over route 53.


this isn't my first sighting, and since i am closed to o'hare, i am familiar to distinguise this was not a jet plane or helicopter. it was at 9:33pm, so i hope others will report it.
content.summary: Object with 2 large pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of november 24, 2011 i was walking to my car after visiting with my brother and his family. 

i looked up at the sky and noticed there was an orange tear drop shape crossing the sky. my brother and fiance both took notice and we watched as it crossed. 

my older brother is a retired air force technician who worked with a-10's and was skeptical at first. we looked for any form of landing or caution lights but saw none. the first object was moving across the sky from what appeared west-to-east and then shot off into the distance.

soon after, another object of same color and shape appeared along the same flight path. it was bright orange and looked almost like a comet. it followed what, from the ground, appeared to be the same path.

as we watched, a group of people in a car pulled over to ask us if we saw the same thing. we answered that we were just then looking at it. we watched until it disappeared into the horizon. it hooked up into the sky, but seemed to fade into the distance as if it was going beyond our view.

there was no sound and no trail that we could see. we did witness it flying what looked to be parallel to the clouds before they went through them. the clouds did lighten with the orange color. 

we didn't observe any pulsing or fluctuations. it was just a fuzzy solid orange.

my fiance said she thought the top had two solid red lights with an orange bottom. however, i did not notice a difference.

i took incredibly poor quality video with my phone, but need to send it to my e-mail to notice if i caught anything.
content.summary: Leaving my brother's thanksgiving, saw lights fly across night sky under clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
We were heading home from thanksgiving dinner with family when i noticed a bright orange light at our 12:00.  i pulled my car over to use my phone to video record the light, we watched it for about 1 minute until it faded out.  i am not positive that it was moving when we first saw it, but it was stationary the entire time i recorded it.  
i do not know how to upload the video off my phone, but i will figure it out and submit it as aoon as possible.
content.summary: Orange ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Was standing outside with wife while she talked to neighbor. was looking up at sky like usual and actually saw it come into atmosphere(best i can describe)it showed up as if out of nowhere leaving a short/brief contrail as it apparently entered atmosphere. it was square/rectanglular but with rounded edges. it glowed a briliant red/orange. this happened around 6:00 pm still very much light outside. it had a very small tail on it(i assumed it was a tail cuz it was in the back of the direction it traveled)the apparent tail could have just been part of craft as there was no diff in color and could see no distinction between tail and craft. after watching in amazement for maybe 45secs i pulled out my phone and snapped two pics then watched it until i could nolonger see it(about another minute and a half) it traveled in a straight line across the sky. after it had gone i looked at my pics and there was nothing on them. i do not believe it was a meteor or any kind of space debris nor was it a plane or helicopter. i live close to a small airport and see planes and heli's all day(as well as hear them)there was a small plane in the sky to the west of it and this thing was at least 5times the size of the plane.It was traveling from west to east away from plane. whoever was flying plane must have seen it.
content.summary: Glowing red/orange square with rounded edges with small tail. brief contrail

content.detailedDescription:
It was daylight by 330 a.M. we were outside house and were starteled by white hot light entering from about 55 degrees at our 12 oclock. no tail or
obvious meteorite disintegration. i had time to walk up a small slope, and i made some calculations as to its crash/landing site. the location is on land but has a stretch of ocean between it. i heard of no other report, as we thought anyone within a 200 mile radius, including ships would have to have seen it. i had another incident 30 years ago, which i shared with ufon
as i was on board of directors. as a counsellor i interviewed claims of sightings,etc. i will keep you posted as to findings. keep up great work.
content.summary: Was out side with friend, sun was up, sky clear. we  both observed  a brilliant white light that was visible for a time that belies a meteor, but i have not yet investigated site.

content.detailedDescription:
It was daylight by 330 a.M. we were outside house and were starteled by white hot light entering from about 55 degrees at our 12 oclock. no tail or
obvious meteorite disintegration. i had time to walk up a small slope, and i made some calculations as to its crash/landing site. the location is on land but has a stretch of ocean between it. i heard of no other report, as we thought anyone within a 200 mile radius, including ships would have to have seen it. i had another incident 30 years ago, which i shared with ufon
as i was on board of directors. as a counsellor i interviewed claims of sightings,etc. i will keep you posted as to findings. keep up great work.
content.summary: Was out side with friend, sun was up, sky clear. we  both observed  a brilliant white light that was visible for a time that belies a meteor, but i have not yet investigated site.

content.detailedDescription:
First of all, i won't make everyone read this whole post.
the message i got, clear as a bell,  was "the triangles are there to protect you".
more details:
my partner had recently died, and i wanted to communicate with his 'spirit'. i'd had one or two telepathic experiences with some kind of being during the previous year or two. i made contact ( by doing the equivalent  of loooking  into a crystal ball). the 'spirit', i'll call it, kept giving me a different name than my partner's, but i still tried to believe it was it was my partner. 

the spirit didn't seem interested in answering questions.When i recalled an intimate moment with my partner, the spirit answered politely, "cool", but then i knew it wasn't my longtime boyfriend - and he'd used an uncharacteristic word. one thing the spirit kept repeating was "hell is real"  many times. it amost like a warning, or probably it was a warning.  i don't know who or what the spirit was, but it might have been human, because i had strong feeling he had experienced hell himself.

 so all you unkind, cruel, and  indifferent people out there - you might have time to change/right your wrongs.

i'm giving extra details here, trying to make this encounter less crazy-sounding. i know i might be doing the opposite. now back to the matter at hand.

when it said, out of the blue, " the triangles are there to protect you" i knew for sure the  spirit wasn't my boyfriend, who refused to even think about ufo's, and that this wasn't coming out of my own head. it would have been the last thing from me, since i've been afraid of everything strange i've seen in the sky. i was flabbergasted. the moment will always be engraved on my memory.

i  look at the " last 20 case reports" almost every day, for years, to comfort myself that i'm not alone seeing ufo's, and i've noticed that people never seem to be afraid of triangles.

the aliens looking down at the people as if they were cattle at the 4th of july picnic is the scariest thing i've read here. just though i'd throw that in, as a reminder that there likely are evil beings we do need protection from. 

of course there's no way to  judge if "it" was telling the truth or lying. but i prefer to think of it as true. i do know it was real. i'm a college graduate retired nurse in  my 60's and haven't been treated for mental illness.
content.summary: The reason the triangles are there

content.detailedDescription:
Please see video. picture is worth much more than words.

also see ufo in cloud cover in the second daytime video from nov 11- i took the video just to see what changed on 11,11,11 - tiny distant gray spherical moving objects enter center of the cloud and eject from the perimeter of the cloud at a rate of about 20 per second... every cloud has a silver lining.
content.summary: Many - watch video. one appearance also 1 frame long...

content.detailedDescription:
Please see video. picture is worth much more than words.
also see ufo in cloud cover in the second daytime video from nov 11- i took the video just to see what changed on 11,11,11 - tiny distant gray spherical moving objects enter center of the cloud and eject from the perimeter of the cloud at a rate of about 20 per second... every cloud has a silver lining.
content.summary: Many - watch video. one appearance also 1 frame long...

content.detailedDescription: Hello, i am here in albuquerque new mexico, i was on the way to my parents house right around the corner from my house at 10:33 pm wednsday november 23rd 2011 and i seen a fireball in the sky that was moving very slow then stopped, whatever it was was dripping trails of burning ? underneath it- i stopped at the street corner for about two minutes and just watched the object - i was just making a quick trip to my parents house and did not even have my phone with me to take a pic unfortunatley. i took off around the corner and got to my parents house and brought my dad outside to witness it as well, we were both really suprised what we were seeing and then some clouds got in the way. what was this? i would love to find out!?
content.summary: Red stationary fireball in sky dripping fire trails, did not move then gained altitude

content.detailedDescription:
830 pm on november 23rd, 2011.  

while walking through a forest with dogs i came upon an area where the path goes down a hill.  upon taking this path i began to notice that my vision was acutely disturbed.  there began to appear to be distortions in the outside world and focusing on anything was extremely difficult.  i initially thought that it was just the darkness of the evening under the canopy of trees and continued walking down the path despite increasing difficulty with my vision and the commencement of a feeling of somatic pressure on my body which made movements increasingly difficult aswell.  at one point i decided to turn around because of the distortion in my visual field and walked several steps back up the path in the opposite direction.  this seemed to alleviate some of the feeling of pressure and my normal vision began to return.  i once again resumed my original course and turned back down the path.  this time i proceeded further than when i turned back, and this action increased the intensity of the visual distortions and the somatic pressure.  without proper use of my eyes i had to actually feel through the air for a tree to hold on to.  it was at this point that i became intensely curious as to what the effects were that had affected my body.  i noticed the start of a soft red glow that was illuminating my left hand that rested on the tree trunk, as well some of the trunk, the left side of my body and the ground around the base of the tree, this stood out primarily because my eyes had no trouble at all focusing on the illuminated objects and i clearly saw my hand in a red light.  upon looking outwards into the forest and at the sky in an attempt at locating a source of the light, the distortions were immediately present in my visual field.  the sensation was one of having a lens placed over the eyes that removed depth perception, contrast and colour and rendered my surrounding objects indistinguable.  

after witnessing the red glow, i made a final decision to remove myself from the area and i turned around and began groping at the air and slowly walking back up the path.  the effects on my body subsequently dropped away and stopped as i made my way farther from the area.  i continued to walk up the path back towards my car with the dogs and after approximately 5 minutes i turned around and looked into the sky.  there was a very bright, orangish/yellow star like light in the sky, which i took at first to be venus.  i was observing the light through the branches of a tree that was in between me and object.  after only 15 seconds i noticed that the light in the sky was in fact moving and had passed behind several of the tree branches.  at this time i ran into the field to remove the tree from between myself and the light to get as clear a view of it as possible.  after another 30 seconds of watching the light, it began to grow and resolved itself into 9 distinct yellowish/white lights in a definite triangular pattern.  the object was now moving directly towards me a constant rate of speed.  as the object came closer, there became visible several smaller lights positioned at irregular places on the greater unlit structure of the aeriel object.  the sound began as a low bass-like rumble that became a pulsating reverberation as the object came closer.  the larger structure of the object was greater than the triangle of lights, i could tell this because it was occluding some of the stars behind it as it moved towards me.  when it passed it went directly over my head, i estimate at approximately 500 to 1000 feet above me.  the only sound at this point was the pulsating reverberation.  the object continued along its trajectory and the sound was persistent until they left both my auditory and visual ability to detect them further.
content.summary: Event included physical distortions to my vision and the appearence of a red light around my body minutes before witnessing the object cross the sky
